lead_paragraph: The problems that followed the earthquake — spotty coordination with aid groups, the specter of tent cities — are hovering over the response to Hurricane Matthew.

headline.print_headline: After Storm, Haiti Tries to Avoid Flaws of 2010 Quake Relief
headline.main: After Hurricane, Haiti Confronts Scars From 2010 Earthquake Recovery

snippet: The problems that followed the earthquake — spotty coordination with aid groups, the specter of tent cities — are hovering over the response to Hurricane Matthew....
abstract: Haitian government, recalling disorganization and billions of dollars of wasted aid following 2010 earthquake, is trying to avoid same errors in wake of Hurricane Matthew; priority is to create sustainable recovery, avoiding recurrence of vacuum that occurred once aid dried up.
